main event: A witness reported seeing a red fireball moving on a southwest course across the sky in W. Jefferson, Ohio on September 27, 1957.
interesting points: The object moved from horizon to horizon in 2 minutes., The object was described as a circular disc with a dull orange color., The witness was playing football when they first noticed the object., The weather conditions at the time were not specifically mentioned., The witness expressed certainty that the object was definitely not a falling star, but more like a rocket.
witness description: Witness was 25 years old, male, and indicated they had experienced in high school education.
